titles.title: A resolution honoring and recognizing the achievements of the United States Air Force Academy football program over the last 27 years.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/1/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Honors and recognizes the numerous contributions made by the U.S. Air Force Academy football program over the last 27 years to Colorado Springs and the surrounding communities, the U.S. Air Force Academy, and the U.S. Air Force.
